name: Sonic in Paynt
overview: Sonic in Paynt is a parody hack of Sonic the Hedgehog for the Sega Mega Drive by sebmal (credited as "thehulk" in the hack as a semi-successful attempt at trolling Sonic Cult). In an attempt to make the worst hack possible, uncoordinated palettes were utilized. This hack is similar to the tongue-in-cheek hack Sonic 1337 by Ultima. There's also a sequel, Sonic and Tals in Paynt, which sports many "improvements". Story Taken from the ReadMe: ok so sonic is runnign all over the plase and then dr robotnick sees him and says "i hate sonic i have a plan to get rid of him onse and for all". so dr robotnick gos to his labratory and makes his new invenchin the chaos paynt. the chaos paynt has the abilty to tern any one who is covrd in it into a blob of paynt with its radeoactif power. so dr robot nick goes to sonic and says "haha i have you now sonic" and throws the paynt on sonic and the hole enitre world and then dr robotnick runs away. "oh no if i dont beet dr robotnick the hole worlds will tern into paynt" sonic says. and so sonic goes to beat up dr robot nick and save the wirld. How to Play Taken from the ReadMe: run arownd and evry buttin is jump dont get hit by the bad gys
